synopsis.text: Rudger—until now, an invisible companion birthed from a young girl's vivid imagination—finds himself thrust into a perilous journey in a world where dreams can take on a life of their own and be consumed by others. As Amanda Shuffleup's imaginary friend, Rudger remains unseen by everyone except her. But when the ominous Mr. Bunting arrives, everything changes. Mr. Bunting is a hunter of imaginaries, with rumors swirling that he devours them. Forced to run for his very existence, Rudger must navigate the treacherous real world while trying to locate Amanda before Mr. Bunting captures him or her memories of him vanish, leading to his complete disappearance. Joined by newfound allies in "The Imaginaries Town," Rudger embarks on an unseen adventure, risking the destinies of those he holds dear.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
